column2: Roles and Responsibility: Employees should have a solid understanding of how the forex market operates, including factors influencing exchange rates, major currency pairs, trading mechanisms, and market participants. Knowledge of regulatory requirements and compliance standards related to forex trading is essential. This includes understanding anti-money laundering (AML) regulations, know your customer (KYC) procedures, and other legal obligations. Familiarity with trading platforms and software commonly used in forex trading is important. This includes understanding how to execute trades, analyses market data, and use trading tools effectively. Knowledge of key economic indicators and their impact on currency exchange rates is essential. Employees should be able to interpret economic data releases, central bank policies, geopolitical events, and other factors influencing currency markets.  Effective communication skills are essential for forex professionals, especially those involved in client-facing roles. Employees should be able to communicate market analysis, trading strategies, and risk assessments clearly and concisely to clients and colleagues. Requirements: Minimum of 1-2 years of experience in a similar role within the travel industry. Maintain clear and effective communication with clients throughout the Foreign Exchange  procedure.
column11: Foreign Exchange, Foreign Currency, Money Market, Money Transfer, Forex Management, Mathematics

column1: Spinny Hiring Loan Associate - Tamil/Marathi/Kannada For Gurgaon
column2: Spinny hiring  Loan Associates & Finance Consultants  for below locations -  Contact No. 6306363088 1.) Gurugram  - Capital Business Park, sector 48 Looking for candidates who should know  Hindi /English & Tamil   About the Role - The candidate shall be responsible for assisting and coordinating with used car loan customers for collecting customer details, document collection, down payments, car delivery scheduling & loan kit signing. The candidate shall also be required to follow up and coordinate with banks/NBFCs for end-to-end processing of loans.    Ideal Candidate -  An ideal candidate would be a hardworking and enterprising individual, with excellent analytical and communication skills. Interested candidates must have an ingenious, scientific approach to problems, backed by a strong outcome-oriented point of view. The candidate is expected to have experience with more than 1 Bank/NBFC in auto loans.    Key Responsibilities Include -  End to end coordination with Banks/NBFCs for loan processing (approval & disbursement)   Executing requirements for central login process & instant approval process for loan applications  ??Coordinating with the central team & Banks/NBFCs for loan cancellation process as and when required ??Handling subjectivity of loan processes on a case-to-case basis  Evaluating and authorizing approval of business or credit loans whenever necessary   Preparation of detailed loan proposals & submission of loan applications in a timely manner  ??Rejecting loan applications and explaining deficiencies to applicants as and when required  ??Coordinating with RTOs & Banks/NBFCs for loan cases to ensure timely disbursals  ??Pre-login follow up with customers, relationship managers (car sales team) & sales closure team  ??Strong focus on customer experience    Requirements - ??College graduate  ??1-7 years of experience in auto loans (experience in used car loans is preferred but not mandatory)  ??Experience with DSA is preferred  ??Age upto 35-36 Years
column11: finance, Tractor Loan, nbfc, auto loans, Car Loan, used car loan, Loan Operations, loan processing, Two Wheeler Loan, Vehicle Finance, Commercial Vehicle Loans, Disbursement, Auto Finance
